2 - Describing the study cohort

Source: vignettes/c_describing_data.Rmd
c_describing_data.Rmd

bllflow builds from the tableone package to present the study cohort and description statistics. Also planned are tools to help create a study codebook.

library(survival)
data(pbc)
library("tableone")
catVars <- c("status", "trt", "ascites", "hepato", "spiders", "edema", "stage")
TableOne <- CreateTableOne(data = pbc,strata = c("trt","stage"), factorVars = catVars)
# TODO: checkedTableOne <- CheckSmallCells(TableOne)
# TODO: show how the MSW provides instructoins to create tables.
